DOC.brief_title: A Trial C-TraC Intervention Dementia Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients dementia often experience poor quality transition hospital community . In response , investigator develop pilot Coordinated-Transitional Care ( C-TraC ) program -- low-cost , telephone-based intervention design improve care coordination outcomes hospitalized patient dementia high-risk condition discharge community setting . A single-blind , prospective , randomized-controlled trial use participant randomly assign receive usual ( i.e . standard ) care , usual care plus C-TraC intervention . Outcomes assessed via schedule phone-calls 14 , 30 , 90 day post-hospitalization . A 45-day phone call also conduct complete brief satisfaction survey caregiver post-hospital experience .
